featured_product.name: Featured Magical Item
featured_product.description: Be prepared to experience a next level nap with our soon to be released Featured Magical Item! You'll never sleep better than with the magic of our Featured Magical Item. Waste no time and pre-order today!

products.name: Magical Night-lite
products.description: This one of a kind magical night-lite will not only illuminates your room, but gives you magical dreams that you'll remember forever.

products.name: Never ending glass of Water
products.description: Tired of running out of water when you sleep? This glass of water is always half-full. And it always stays clean and germ free!

products.name: Always rested Alarm Clocky
products.description: Clocky knows when to wake you for optimal sleep. Clockly will never let you miss a meeting. Gone are the morning of fighting the snooze button. With Clocky you'll never wake up on the wrong side of the bed.
